thread.title: Lamar Odom wants Khloé Kardashian back
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom wants Khloé Kardashian back

title: Lamar Odom wants Khloé Kardashian back
text:
Lamar Odom wants Khloé Kardashian back Lamar Odom wants Khloé Kardashian back Lamar Odom Khloe Kardashian 
Lamar Odom has reportedly been wishing for a while that he could rekindle his relationship with estranged wife Khloé Kardashian, who has stuck by his side after he was found unconscious at a Nevada brothel following a drug binge last week. 
Lamar Odom was always hoping to rekindle his relationship with Khloé Kardashian. 
The pair have put their divorce on hold so the former LA Lakers star can focus on his recovery after being found unconscious at a brothel in Nevada following a drugs binge last week. 
An insider said: ''He was hoping they'd get back together. I think a lot of this was because he was so heartbroken. He really slid further down when he realised he couldn't get her back. He's been in a down place for a while.'' 
The 35-year-old athlete allegedly started using drugs after the SUV he was travelling in, while en route to his cousin's funeral in 2011, killed a 15-year-old pedestrian. 
A friend said: ''He's said he never fully recovered from that and has been living with the sadness ever since. Things kept getting worse and worse, he was numbing the pain with whatever he could find.'' 
While Khloé has vowed to remain by Lamar's side and has taken a break from her romance with James Harden, it would take a lot for her to consider giving their marriage another chance. 
The insider told Us Weekly magazine: ''Keep in mind, Lamar was found in a brothel. He has been sober before and has fallen off the wagon. That's not something she's willing to endure again.'' Contactmusic
